  • Hello!

Ebiten now supports Nintendo Switch™!

Hajime Hoshi
2021-06-11

Thanks to the cooperation of Odencat Inc., Ebiten now officially supports Nintendo Switch™! Ebiten games written in Go will run on Nintendo Switch almost without modification.

The tool is not open source. In order to develop for Nintendo Switch, you need to sign the developer agreement for Nintendo platform with Nintendo. For more information, please see Nintendo Developer Portal, the portal site for Nintendo platform developers.

In addition, "Bear's Restaurant" is scheduled to be released as a game for Nintendo Switch using Ebiten. Please look forward to it!

反馈建议? 请在GitHub上反馈我. 谢谢!
